statements: SELECT * FROM debtor_profiles;
SELECT debtor_id, debt_amount, payment_status FROM debtor_profiles;
SELECT debtor_id, debt_amount, payment_status FROM debtor_profiles WHERE debt_amount > 1000;
SELECT debtor_id, payment_status, aging FROM debtor_profiles ORDER BY aging DESC;
SELECT * FROM debtor_profiles WHERE payment_status = 'Late' ORDER BY debtor_id ASC;
SELECT debtor_id, debt_amount, payment_status, aging FROM debtor_profiles WHERE debt_amount > 1000 ORDER BY debtor_id ASC, payment_status DESC;
SELECT debtor_id, payment_status, aging FROM debtor_profiles WHERE debt_amount < 500 AND payment_status = 'Delayed' ORDER BY debtor_id DESC;
SELECT debtor_id, payment_status, debt_amount FROM debtor_profiles WHERE aging >= 30 OR (debt_amount >= 500 AND payment_status = 'Pending') ORDER BY debt_amount DESC, aging ASC;
SELECT * FROM debtor_profiles WHERE debt_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY payment_status ASC, debtor_id DESC, aging DESC;
SELECT debtor_id, debt_amount, payment_status, aging FROM debtor_profiles WHERE payment_status IN ('On Time', 'Delayed') ORDER BY aging ASC, debtor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM debtors
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debtors WHERE payment_status = 'Pending'
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debtors ORDER BY debt_amount DESC
SELECT debtor_name, payment_status FROM debtors WHERE aging_days > 30
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name FROM debtors WHERE debtor_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debtors WHERE payment_status = 'unpaid' ORDER BY debt_amount DESC, debtor_name ASC, aging_days ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM debtors WHERE debt_amount > 1000.00 AND payment_status = 'unpaid' ORDER BY debtor_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount, aging_days FROM debtors WHERE debt_amount BETWEEN 500.00 AND 2000.00 AND aging_days > 30 ORDER BY aging_days DESC, debtor_name ASC LIMIT 8
SELECT debtor_name, payment_status FROM debtors WHERE debtor_name LIKE '%a%' OR debtor_name LIKE '%e%' ORDER BY debtor_name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, debt_amount, aging_days FROM debtors WHERE payment_status = 'pending' ORDER BY debtor_id ASC LIMIT 6
SELECT * FROM debtors;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount, payment_status FROM debtors WHERE debt_amount > 5000;
SELECT debtor_name, payment_status FROM debtors ORDER BY debtor_name DESC;
SELECT debtor_name, payment_status FROM debtors WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount, payment_status FROM debtors WHERE payment_status = 'Unpaid';
SELECT * FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount, payment_status, aging FROM debtors WHERE debt_amount > 1000 AND aging > 30;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount, payment_status FROM debtors WHERE debt_amount < 500 OR aging < 15;
SELECT strategy_name, criteria FROM strategies WHERE LENGTH(criteria) > 100;
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, debt_amount FROM Debtors WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM Debtors WHERE aging > 30 AND payment_status = 'Overdue';
SELECT segment_name, criteria_description FROM DebtorSegments WHERE segment_id = 2;
SELECT plan_id, strategy_description, target_action FROM StrategyPlans WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, debt_amount FROM Debtors;
SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount, aging FROM Debtors ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM DebtorSegments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT segment_name, criteria_description FROM DebtorSegments JOIN StrategyPlans ON DebtorSegments.segment_id = StrategyPlans.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM debtors ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, debt_amount FROM debtors WHERE payment_status='Pending'
SELECT debtor_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY debtor_id ORDER BY total_payments DESC
SELECT * FROM strategies WHERE target_group='High Priority'
SELECT debtor_id, strategy_name, segment FROM profiles INNER JOIN strategies ON profiles.strategy_id = strategies.strategy_id
SELECT * FROM debtors WHERE debt_amount > 5000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, debt_amount, payment_status FROM debtors WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY debt_amount ASC;
SELECT d.name, p.amount, p.payment_date FROM debtors AS d JOIN payments AS p ON d.id = p.debtor_id WHERE p.amount > 10000 ORDER BY p.payment_date DESC;
SELECT p.strategy_name, p.target_group, pr.segment FROM strategies AS p JOIN profiles AS pr ON p.strategy_id = pr.strategy_id WHERE pr.segment = 'High Risk' ORDER BY p.strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM aging WHERE days >= 30 ORDER BY description ASC;
